title: How to Wash Satin Sheets

steps.headline: Hand-wash the sheets in lukewarm water.
Hand-wring the sheets.
steps.description: Note that wet satin tears very easily, so handle with care. The best method is to place the sheets inside an absorbent white towel and then wring.

steps.headline: Hang to dry.
steps.description: Hang the sheets over a clothes horse or other similar hanging place out of the sun. If you cannot hang it out to dry, use the lowest setting in a clothes dryer.

text: Hand-wash the sheets in lukewarm water. Use a gentle fabric wash. Hand-wring the sheets. Note that wet satin tears very easily, so handle with care. The best method is to place the sheets inside an absorbent white towel and then wring. Hang to dry. Hang the sheets over a clothes horse or other similar hanging place out of the sun. If you cannot hang it out to dry, use the lowest setting in a clothes dryer. Finished.
